column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Ordered the soft scrambled with applewood bacon with fresh baked baguette. The eggs were very flavorful. I had asked they be medium rather than soft. Perfect. Unfortunately the bacon was not completely cooked
column2: certainly not crispy. The baguette was toasted and so good. If butter and jelly were included
column3: would have been five star! Will do again!!
